Articles.Content: I recently downloaded the current KSP on a new computer. Problem I am having is that the Launcher remains stuck at "Checking for Updates". I haven't been able to get past that point. What do I need to do to fix that?

On a Mac? Check the second post of The Mac OS X Thread (link in my signature).

Otherwise, please read the support stickies (the posts at the top of this forum).

Welcome to the forums!
